ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Game loading faster
ygData.msgSnippet: They did, don t you read those little messages on the screen during loading. I think a couple of the messages are You ve become better at loading and
ygData.messageBody:
They did, don't you read those little messages on the screen during loading. I think a couple of the messages are "You've become better at loading" and something like "Loading is now .99999999 faster"!

;-)
Durgaa

On 28 Dec 2005 15:42:57 -0000, EverQuest@yahoogroups.com < EverQuest@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

Message: 3
   Date: Tue, 27 Dec 2005 19:19:18 -0600
   From: Su <suceress@...>
Subject: Re: RE: Digest Number 1249

LOL!
Yeah, I heard about some of those and was like "where was I when people were benefiting?"
Although in truth I probably wouldn't cheat intentionally... I just wish they would allow addons or something to improve gameplay. It might be nice if they just figured out a way to make the game load faster..
luv,
-Su
